text.autoconfig.gamepadboat.title: Gamepad Boat Configuration
text.autoconfig.gamepadboat.option.contr: Which controller to pick, uses GLFW joystick identifiers.
text.autoconfig.gamepadboat.option.pollR:
How many times per second should the
 gamepad be polled for new data.
text.autoconfig.gamepadboat.option.pwmCy:
Length of the full cycle in which the
 key strokes are sent, keep below poll rate.
text.autoconfig.gamepadboat.option.deadz: Ignored center radius for analog input
